owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

publicMint(uint256).details: A function that anyone can mint. Before reveal, it is minted in the unreveal state

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

repairTokenURI(uint256,string).details: A function that can be repaired in the event of an unintended error when revealed. Only the owner can execute it

params.tokenHash: The unique hash value of the token
params.tokenId: The ID of the token you want to repair

revealTokens(uint256[],string[]).details: A function that revises tokens that have not yet been revealed. It issues tokens in the next scenario at the same time

params.tokenHash: The unique hash value of the token
params.tokenIds: The ID of the tokens you want to reveal

setBaseURI(string).details: Set base URI of reveal tokens. Only the owner can do it

setMerkleRoot(bytes32).details: Functions that set the required Merklute of whitelist validation

setNextScenarioConenct(address).details: Functions that associate with the following collection of scenarios

params.nextScenario: Address of the next scenario contract

setNotRevealedURI(string).details: Set base URI of unreveal tokens. Only the owner can do it

setPublicMintState(bool).details: A function that allows users to start mint

setRevealState(bool).details: A function that allows users to start reveal

setTicketMintState(bool).details: Functions that allow users to initiate ticket minting

setWhitelistMintState(bool).details: Functions that allow users to initiate whitelist minting

setupSale(uint256).details: Prevent bot, set timer to start minting, only owner can run

ticketMint(uint256).details: Only those who have tickets can mint.

tokenURI(uint256).details: Returns the Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) for `tokenId` token

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

whitelistMint(uint256,bytes32[]).details: Functions that only validated whitelists can mint
